mapper.select: SELECT t.id, t.customer_code, c.name as customerName, t.material_code, m.NAME AS materialName, m.model, d2.dict_value modelName, m.unit, d3.dict_value unitName, t.unit_price, t.return_count, t.toll_amount, t.approve_state, d4.dict_value as approveStateName, t.approve_opinion, t.approve_time, t.confirm_state, d5.dict_value as confirmStateName, t.confirm_opinion, t.confirm_time, t.bill_no, t.bill_state , t.in_code, t.return_type, t.return_user, u2.user_name AS returnUserName, t.return_time, t.create_by, u.user_name AS createByName, t.create_time, t.update_by, u1.user_name AS updateByName, t.update_time, t.remark FROM sales_return t LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON u.user_login = t.create_by LEFT JOIN sys_user u1 ON u1.user_login = t.update_by LEFT JOIN sys_user u2 ON u2.user_login = t.return_user LEFT JOIN material_info m ON m.CODE = t.material_code LEFT JOIN sys_dict_data d2 ON d2.dict_code = m.model and d2.dict_type = 'material_model' LEFT JOIN sys_dict_data d3 ON d3.dict_code = m.unit and d3.dict_type = 'material_unit' LEFT JOIN sys_dict_data d4 ON d4.dict_code = t.approve_state and d4.dict_type = 'approve_state' LEFT JOIN sys_dict_data d5 ON d5.dict_code = t.confirm_state and d5.dict_type = 'confirm_state' left join customer_supply c on c.code = t.customer_code where t.id = #{id}
